column1: The text introduces the policy, a section, or a group of practices, but it does not mention a specific practice.
The text describes a specific data practice that is not covered by our label scheme.
The text does not fit into our label scheme.
The policy makes a statement about how data from European users is treated (e.g., Safe Harbor provisions).
The text describes how to contact the company with questions, concerns, or complaints about the privacy policy.
The policy makes specific provisions for international audiences, non-US citizens, or non-European citizens (e.g., about international data transfer).
You can use privacy configuration settings (in your browser or on your device) to control the use of cookies and tracking elements by the site, which collects it for a basic service or feature.
An unspecified third party does receive unspecified information about you for mergers or acquisitions.
The policy makes a statement about how data from children is treated.
Data transfer between user and website/app is encrypted, e.g., SSL, TLS, HTTPS.

You can use privacy configuration settings (in your browser or on your device) to control the use of cookies and tracking elements by the site, which collects it for an additional (non-basic) service or feature.
Another part of the company or institution does receive unspecified information about you for an unspecified purpose.
Another part of the company or institution does receive unspecified information about you for targeted advertising.
Users with accounts can edit their information, within the scope of information explicitly provided by the user.
An unnamed third party does not receive your contact information for targeted advertising. You can configure your privacy with user settings provided by the site for the use of your information.
The site collects your cookies or tracking elements for an unspecified purpose. Collection happens when you implicitly provide information on the website.
An unnamed third party does not do something outside of our label scheme with unspecified information about you for an unspecified purpose.
When a change is made to the privacy policy that significantly affects data practices, users are personally notified. Users' choices regarding policy changes are not mentioned or are unclear.
The site collects your unspecified information for an unspecified purpose. Collection happens when you implicitly provide information by an unnamed service or third party for users with accounts.
A named third party does do something unspecified with your cookies or tracking elements for analytics or research.
When a change of an unspecified nature is made to the privacy policy, users are personally notified. Users have a choice not covered by our label scheme.
The policy makes generic security statements, e.g., "we protect your data" or "we use technology/encryption to protect your data".
